Summary: bright ball thought was sat at first then plane but moved slow and constant bright light
divs: Sighting DetailsObserved a very bright white constant light not landing lights or indicator lights (red green alternating).. it move from a south southeast direction that appeared to be parallel to position. However it descended to a northeast position to mountain range at least 20 miles away.. I would say it could have been a plane with landing lights on but it was to bright for the distance it was away from me...
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Sandpoint
There were no other sightings in Sandpoint on or around June 4th 2013
